summary: Completed testing of premium preview bug fix. Backend API fully functional, frontend testing limited due to React Native architecture.

testing_limitations.issue: React Native/Expo app cannot be tested with browser automation
testing_limitations.details: Frontend is a mobile app built with React Native/Expo, not a web application
testing_limitations.impact: Cannot verify UI behavior of Preview Ended modal directly
testing_limitations.workaround: Code analysis confirms fix implementation is correct

testing_limitations.issue: Frontend service failing to start due to file watcher limits
testing_limitations.details: ENOSPC: System limit for number of file watchers reached
testing_limitations.impact: Cannot run frontend for any testing
testing_limitations.fix_priority: LOW - Does not affect production deployment

passed_tests: Premium tracks with preview times retrieval
Nasheed of Dawn preview settings validation (70s-100s)
Featured premium tracks with preview settings
Preview time validation for all premium tracks

success_percentage.frontend: N/A (React Native app - cannot test with browser automation)
